g.title: Sheet.1708
g.desc: Require compliant PCs and mobile devices This policy enforces...
g.text: Require compliant PCs and mobile devices.Enforces Intune management for PCs and mobile devices.

g.title: Sheet.1710
g.desc: Block clients that don’t support modern authentication Client...
g.text: Block clients that don’t support modern authentication.Clients that don’t use modern authentication can bypass Conditional Access policies.

g.desc: Require MFA always This is also available for all Microsoft 365 ...

g.text: Require approved apps.Enforces app protection for mobile devices.

g.desc: PCs include devices running the Windows or macOS platforms
g.text: PCs running on Windows or macOS platforms.

g.title: Sheet.1728
g.desc: Phones and tablets include devices running the iOS, iPadOS, o...
g.text: Mobile devices running on iOS, iPadOS, or Android platforms.

g.title: Sheet.1730
g.desc: Requires Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 E3 with the E5 Ident...
g.text: Requires one of the following subscriptions:• Microsoft 365 E5• Microsoft 365 E3 with the E5 Identity add-on• Microsoft 365 with EMS E5• Individual Microsoft Entra ID P2 licenses

g.title: Sheet.1719
g.desc: Require multifactor authentication (MFA) when sign-in risk is...
g.text: Require multifactor authentication (MFA) when sign-in risk is Medium or High.

g.title: Sheet.1717
g.desc: Require MFA when sign-in risk is low, medium, or high
g.text: Require MFA when sign-in risk is Low, Medium, or High.

g.title: Sheet.1699
g.desc: High-risk users must change password This policy forces users...
g.text: High-risk users must change password.Forces users to change their password when signing in if high-risk activity is detected for their account.
